single-action: `CLICK` the 'Firefox' icon to open the browser
`CLICK` the address bar and `TYPE` 'https://kisssub.org/'
`KEY` ENTER
`WAIT` for the homepage to load
`CLICK` the search box on the website
`TYPE` the Chinese anime name (e.g., '鬼灭之刃')
`KEY` ENTER
`WAIT` for search results to load
`SCROLL` down until the correct anime title appears
`CLICK` the anime title link to open the detail page
`WAIT` for the anime detail page to load
`SCROLL` to the magnet link section placeholder
`CLICK` the '开启虫洞' button
`WAIT` for a new browser tab or window to open
`CLICK` the button labeled '点击插入脚本' (Insert Script)
`WAIT` for the page to confirm '脚本已插入' (script inserted)
`CLICK` the browser tab for the original anime detail page
`CLICK` the 'Refresh' button or press `CTRL+R` to reload the page
`WAIT` for the refreshed content to load
`SCROLL` until the new '磁链下载' (magnet download) button appears
`CLICK` the '磁链下载' button
`CLICK` 'Open with qBittorrent' in the browser prompt
`CLICK` 'OK' to confirm launching the torrent client
`WAIT` until qBittorrent opens
`CLICK` the 'Browse' button in qBittorrent to choose save directory
`SELECT` '~/Videos/Anime/' and `CLICK` 'Select Folder'
`CLICK` 'OK' to start the download
`WAIT` until the progress bar reaches 100%
`CLICK` 'Open destination folder' in qBittorrent
`DOUBLE-CLICK` the completed video file to open in VLC
`VERIFY` that playback starts normally
`CLOSE` VLC and qBittorrent windows
